25% OFF RECURRING FOR LIFE DISCOUNT CODE: **LET25OFF4LIFE**

Discount code **LET25OFF4LIFE** is valid on all our Shared, Business, Reseller and VPS Hosting plans listed on our website [www.hostbastic.com](https://www.hostbastic.com)

_Apply discount code at checkout!_

---
